LanguageData.MapGenerator_ModOptions_TryAlwaysSpawnWi: Try to always spawn with holes
The generator will always try to spawn holes in the blueprint. \nHint: Exceptions are buildings containing enemies.
LanguageData.MapGenerator_ModOptions_HoleChancePercen: Chance per cell to generate a hole:
LanguageData.MapGenerator_ModOptions_HoleChanceOnWate: Chance per water-cell to generate a hole:
